Title: Provides certain exemptions for individuals having entered into a contract to play baseball at the minor league level and who are compensated pursuant to the terms of a collective bargaining agreement
Summary: Provides certain exemptions for individuals having entered into a contract to play baseball at the minor league level and who is compensated pursuant to the terms of a collective bargaining agreement; includes exemptions under the labor law from minimum wage, overtime, and recordkeeping requirements and under article 6 of the labor law including but not limited to, recordkeeping requirements, wage statement requirements, and weekly pay requirements for "manual workers".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to providing certain exemptions for individuals having entered into a contract to play baseball at the minor league level and who are compensated pursuant to the terms of a collective bargaining agreement
